name: Respaid
headline: Respectful AI B2B Collection
description:
We use AI to respectfully collect account receivables.
We got 50% collection rate within 20 Days. 

We only need an excel file to start (we integrate as well).
Our most notorious customers include DoorDash, Deel, Flexport, Clipboard Health, Vanta etc...

No risk for your brand (Debtor NPS: 93)

founders.name: John Banner, Founder
founders.description: My prior startup's downfall was due to unpaid invoices. With no viable market solution and seeing that 1/4 of businesses faced bankruptcy for similar reasons, I founded Respaid, using AI and respect to address the issue. Beyond entrepreneurship, I'm a commander in the French Republican Guard, a pianist, composer, and passionate about fintech meeting psychology. An engineer by training, I graduated from Harvard Business School and Ecole Centrale Electronique. Also, I'm a proud dad of 4 under 5 üôÇ

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe714ea/664c9f8ea1b47a161d518a9e_en_clipboard.svg)

$1,549
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e15c7d4016f6490946_6.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e0a92effba6096c331_4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e0f0f85360f2693388_3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e07853209411e75f65_2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6657aa98458b16e71abe837b_1.png)
## Sending multiple notices and getting ghosted?
Your team excels at closing late payments, but a few remain stubborn.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33a855cae7e9769d67f_Notifications01.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b1aff03268bce9ebb_Notifications02.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b5ceb9501e39ef7b4_Notifications03.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33a67ea21e3b3a289b6_Notifications04.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b7a94ab2f080af872_Notifications05.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33bcb13fd2c4eba1f03_Notifications06.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b2dd80d73868fc456_Notifications07.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33a509712bda4d2a19e_Notifications08.png)
## You're not alone.97% still won't pay after 3 notices without legal escalation
But you're avoiding using a collection agency,
because collecting $0 is better than risking your reputation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658a92a86fdb90155448a54_Vector.svg)
enter respaid
## How do we achieve 50% recovery in 20 days?
We treat debtors as humans to achieve unprecedented results that protects your brand.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658f9a1db0a381d5ca0022c_scale.svg)
The voice of a lawyer
No one ignores a lawyer ‚Äî which is why we partner with firms from highly-regarded jurisdictions to maximize repayment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658f999115427f3afca9939_message-circle-heart.svg)
Respectful messaging
The debtor is not always in the wrong, so our messaging & actions leaves an open door for mistakes & miscommunications.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658f9993926e8f210dca8c6_brain-cog.svg)
Powered by AI
We tailor bespoke messages per-debtor that knows what to say, when to say it, and what channel will maximize conversion.
**‚Äú** Respaid drives industry-leading results through cordial communication with customers**‚Äù**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6645617798a3bd58ca0fc3f2_image%2015.png)
Arash Ferdowsi, Dropbox Co-Founder
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/664ca831d4deb6a368be39f6_dropbox_logo.svg.svg)
## Collections + AI = Results
Our unique innovations at Respaid result in a 50% collection rate and 30x faster performance than traditional methods.
AI-Powered Precision Messaging
We don't just send emails, we learn. We collect location, device, engagement and more telemetry to optimize the best next step.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658b0cbbd9ce93b722b3fb0_Frame%20427321102.png)
Database Cleaning
Emails bounce. Employees leave. Our SOC-2 compliant data finds the needles in the haystack.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665e3d8ba7ce0bfd5fe86252_Frame%20427321079.png)
Direct, Modern Payments
Agencies have debtors pay them first. Respaid offers direct payments, increasing trust & authority.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6657dd4aaed763e2394f9364_Frame%20427321080.png)
Uncover Why Debtors Aren't Paying
Understand why your customers aren't paying you. We summarize & categorize so you can not just collect what is owed, but improve your product at the same time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658be93aa432bb8285fcdff_Frame%20427321107.png)
get started
## Zero-fuss onboarding
Don't bother your IT team. You do it yourself, and then watch collections come in as soon as tomorrow.
1. Upload unpaid accounts
Just upload a .csv ‚Äî no invoices needed. Or sync your data via Zapier or other popular built-in integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658b03c604d66cb034b50e1_Frame%20427321103.png)
Download Template
2. Confirm your identity
Securely connect your billing software so your customers can pay you directly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658fdcf722b6cd9c2fce9c7_Frame%20427321108.png)
3. First collections next day
We'll clean your data, and start sending notices to get you paid back
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658b03c1dd4e5294421fd45_Frame%20427321105.png)
Testimonials
## Companies entrusting their brand to Respaid
Learn how brands who care deeply about their reputation trust our respectful and effective collection approach.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe714ea/6658bd7dc966a76e3d17ce82_Frame%20427321106.jpg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/664e2ac1a77efd72a8442eba_Frame%2020808.svg) ![](https://img.youtube.com/vi//maxresdefault.jpg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe714ea/664c9f3ca12648670c869d95_deel_logo.svg.svg)$300MAnnual Revenue1,300Employees$679MFunds Raised](https://www.respaid.com/</testimonials/deel-bcb37>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/664e2ac1a77efd72a8442eba_Frame%2020808.svg) ![](https://img.youtube.com/vi/V2hOidppKd8/maxresdefault.jpg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe714ea/664c9f52c47bacdd3ad855fb_en_flexport.svg)$700MAnnual Revenue3,700Employees$15BFunds Raised](https://www.respaid.com/</testimonials/flexport-e8eaa>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/plugins/Basic/assets/placeholder.60f9b1840c.svg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/664e2ac1a77efd72a8442eba_Frame%2020808.svg) ![](https://img.youtube.com/vi/t-gturtLXHc/maxresdefault.jpg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe714ea/664c9f798fac34fe98119835_en_fondo.svg)Annual RevenueEmployeesFunds Raised](https://www.respaid.com/</testimonials/fondo>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe715ea_Testimonial%20User%2001.jpg)
Michael Reynolds
CFO, Mega Mart
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe71518_Logo%2001.svg)
Secure Servers gave us peace of mind. Variable takes data security seriously, and it reflects in the robustness of their servers. Our financial data is in safe hands.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/66439d63d78259de4d0295b4_left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/66439d63d341aa0fd6bff712_right.svg)
1
## Good questions to ask
Everything you need to know
Do you call my customers?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
Mostly, no. If we determine leaving a message via voicemail using our AI is the most effective method, we will make an attempt.
Do you send my customers letters?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
No. We prioritize a digital footprint to better understand the customer's activity to find the best channel to reach them ‚Äî we will even share these insights with you through our dashboard.
What if a mistake was made, and a customer already paid?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
There are many such cases: customers may have already made a payment, a discount was not applied. We allow for these mix-ups and reconcile them with respect.
What if I am missing some data?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
Not only do we clean your existing data to ensure high-deliverability, but we also leverage AI & proprietary sources to find new or changed contact data to make sure we can track down your customer.
How do I keep my records up-to-date with Respaids' collections?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
Respaid has +6000 integrations as well as an API to synchronize with your accounting stack to ensure you are representing receivables accurately.
Does the debtor pay you directly?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
No! Your customer will pay you directly so you which increases conversion due to high-trust associated with your brand. Other collection services typically have your customer pay them, creating distrust and tampering with your brand's reputation.

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e15c7d4016f6490946_6.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e0a92effba6096c331_4.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e0f0f85360f2693388_3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665640e07853209411e75f65_2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6657aa98458b16e71abe837b_1.png)
## Sending multiple notices and getting ghosted?
Your team excels at closing late payments, but a few remain stubborn.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33a855cae7e9769d67f_Notifications01.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b1aff03268bce9ebb_Notifications02.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b5ceb9501e39ef7b4_Notifications03.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33a67ea21e3b3a289b6_Notifications04.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b7a94ab2f080af872_Notifications05.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33bcb13fd2c4eba1f03_Notifications06.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33b2dd80d73868fc456_Notifications07.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6653b33a509712bda4d2a19e_Notifications08.png)
## You're not alone.97% still won't pay after 3 notices without legal escalation
But you're avoiding using a collection agency,
because collecting $0 is better than risking your reputation.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658a92a86fdb90155448a54_Vector.svg)
enter respaid
## How do we achieve 50% recovery in 20 days?
We treat debtors as humans to achieve unprecedented results that protects your brand.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658f9a1db0a381d5ca0022c_scale.svg)
The voice of a lawyer
No one ignores a lawyer ‚Äî which is why we partner with firms from highly-regarded jurisdictions to maximize repayment.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658f999115427f3afca9939_message-circle-heart.svg)
Respectful messaging
The debtor is not always in the wrong, so our messaging & actions leaves an open door for mistakes & miscommunications.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658f9993926e8f210dca8c6_brain-cog.svg)
Powered by AI
We tailor bespoke messages per-debtor that knows what to say, when to say it, and what channel will maximize conversion.
**‚Äú** Respaid drives industry-leading results through cordial communication with customers**‚Äù**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6645617798a3bd58ca0fc3f2_image%2015.png)
Arash Ferdowsi, Dropbox Co-Founder
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/664ca831d4deb6a368be39f6_dropbox_logo.svg.svg)
## Collections + AI = Results
Our unique innovations at Respaid result in a 50% collection rate and 30x faster performance than traditional methods.
AI-Powered Precision Messaging
We don't just send emails, we learn. We collect location, device, engagement and more telemetry to optimize the best next step.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658b0cbbd9ce93b722b3fb0_Frame%20427321102.png)
Database Cleaning
Emails bounce. Employees leave. Our SOC-2 compliant data finds the needles in the haystack.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/665e3d8ba7ce0bfd5fe86252_Frame%20427321079.png)
Direct, Modern Payments
Agencies have debtors pay them first. Respaid offers direct payments, increasing trust & authority.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6657dd4aaed763e2394f9364_Frame%20427321080.png)
Uncover Why Debtors Aren't Paying
Understand why your customers aren't paying you. We summarize & categorize so you can not just collect what is owed, but improve your product at the same time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658be93aa432bb8285fcdff_Frame%20427321107.png)
get started
## Zero-fuss onboarding
Don't bother your IT team. You do it yourself, and then watch collections come in as soon as tomorrow.
1. Upload unpaid accounts
Just upload a .csv ‚Äî no invoices needed. Or sync your data via Zapier or other popular built-in integrations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658b03c604d66cb034b50e1_Frame%20427321103.png)
Download Template
2. Confirm your identity
Securely connect your billing software so your customers can pay you directly.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658fdcf722b6cd9c2fce9c7_Frame%20427321108.png)
3. First collections next day
We'll clean your data, and start sending notices to get you paid back
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6658b03c1dd4e5294421fd45_Frame%20427321105.png)
Testimonials
## Companies entrusting their brand to Respaid
Learn how brands who care deeply about their reputation trust our respectful and effective collection approach.

![‚ü®12‚ü© ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/664e2ac1a77efd72a8442eba_Frame%2020808.svg) ![](https://img.youtube.com/vi/t-gturtLXHc/maxresdefault.jpg) ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe714ea/664c9f798fac34fe98119835_en_fondo.svg)Annual RevenueEmployeesFunds Raised](https://www.respaid.com/</testimonials/fondo>)

1
## Good questions to ask
Everything you need to know
Do you call my customers?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
Mostly, no. If we determine leaving a message via voicemail using our AI is the most effective method, we will make an attempt.
Do you send my customers letters?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
No. We prioritize a digital footprint to better understand the customer's activity to find the best channel to reach them ‚Äî we will even share these insights with you through our dashboard.
What if a mistake was made, and a customer already paid?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
There are many such cases: customers may have already made a payment, a discount was not applied. We allow for these mix-ups and reconcile them with respect.
What if I am missing some data?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
Not only do we clean your existing data to ensure high-deliverability, but we also leverage AI & proprietary sources to find new or changed contact data to make sure we can track down your customer.
How do I keep my records up-to-date with Respaids' collections?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
Respaid has +6000 integrations as well as an API to synchronize with your accounting stack to ensure you are representing receivables accurately.
Does the debtor pay you directly?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633d7e9bd4516c8fbe711be/6643cb7a4286bdc30fac6879_question.svg)
No! Your customer will pay you directly so you which increases conversion due to high-trust associated with your brand. Other collection services typically have your customer pay them, creating distrust and tampering with your brand's reputation.

generated_description:
**Respaid: The Respectful AI Solution for B2B Collections**

Founded in 2020 and hailing from San Francisco, Respaid stands out in the B2B collections world by employing an innovative blend of respectful communication and artificial intelligence. Part of Y Combinator‚Äôs Batch S23, the company aims to enhance the collections process while safeguarding client reputations. 

**Mission**: The core mission of Respaid is simple: to provide a Respectful AI-driven strategy for collecting account receivables. It's about treating debtors as humans, which is crucial‚Äîafter all, studies show that people are nine times more likely to pay when treated respectfully.

**Results-Driven Approach**: Impressive metrics highlight their effectiveness; they report a collection rate of 50% within just 20 days. This rapid turnaround is a game-changer for businesses struggling with late payments. By merely uploading an Excel file of unpaid accounts to their platform, clients can begin seeing collections the very next day, turning potentially lost revenue into cash flow almost immediately.

**Client Portfolio**: Respaid‚Äôs client list boasts impressive names such as DoorDash, Deel, Flexport, Clipboard Health, and Vanta. This diverse clientele reflects trust in Respaid‚Äôs approach, which consistently yields high debtor NPS scores‚Äîanother testament to their respectful handling of collections.

**Technology and Integration**: Respaid harnesses AI to tailor communications that resonate with each individual debtor. Their system learns from engagement data and adjusts messages over time, optimizing collection strategies and enhancing success rates. They offer a zero-fuss onboarding experience, allowing businesses to integrate effortlessly with popular accounting tools via Zapier and other services.

**Brand Protection**: With a focus on maintaining brand integrity, Respaid emphasizes no risk to client reputation while utilizing their services. This is largely due to their unique communication style and the direct payment model, where customers pay the original business instead of Respaid, fostering trust and reliability.

**Team and Structure**: With a team of 38 under the guidance of group partner Garry Tan, Respaid combines expertise with a rapidly evolving tech landscape. Their operations reflect a deep commitment to finding the best ways to engage late payers while protecting the brands involved.

In summary, Respaid is redefining what it means to collect B2B debts. They blend thoughtful communication with advanced technology, focusing squarely on humanizing the collection process. If you‚Äôre tired of cash flow disruptions from unpaid invoices, it might just be time to see what Respaid can do for you.

For more information, visit [Respaid's website](https://www.respaid.com).
